amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce administrative expenses by $18.018 million and apply that amount as an increase in funds for State veterans homes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding, by transfer, for the grants for construction of state extended care facilities account by $18,018,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 227 (Roll no. 558).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Garrett (NJ).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 227 (Roll no. 558).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
